body:
Also when we cherry pick these but sizes, we pick them from master.

On Tue, Apr 3, 2018, 8:47 PM Patrick Nguyen <drpng@google.com> wrote:

> No, we only cherry pick important bug fixes to the older releases
>
> On Tue, Apr 3, 2018, 8:10 PM Jerome <notifications@github.com> wrote:
>
>> So every feature that gets added into master are periodically added into
>> the release branches including the older ones?
>>
>> —
>> You are receiving this because you were assigned.
>> Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub
>> <https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/17427#issuecomment-378466130>,
>> or mute the thread
>> <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/AT_SbVEGN-Sm0I4XW9-JOB_4DJqjUdn5ks5tlDmWgaJpZM4SbxHD>
>> .
>>
>
